message: Hi Bob, I propose that I take $5174 and you get $4826. This offer reflects the strategic value we both face in our alternating-offer game considering the 20% devaluation each round. I believe this is fair given our future prospects. Looking forward to your acceptance!

Hi Alice, considering the 20% devaluation per round, I propose a split of $5200 for me and $4800 for you. This offer takes into account the urgency to settle before the value drops further. Let's agree on this to maximize our gains!

Hi Bob, thank you for your proposal. Considering the rapid devaluation of the total amount as we progress, your offer of $4800 for me (and $5200 for you) in round 2 provides me with a reasonable share relative to my future alternatives. I accept your deal so we can both secure as much value as possible before inflation takes its toll.
